casebody.data:
PEOPLE v. HERMAN. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. November 16, 1906.) Appeal from Special Term. Jacob Herman was indicted, and from an order, he appeals. Af-< firmed.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J., and WOODWARD, GAY-NOR, RICH, and MILLER, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed, without costs, on the authority of People v. De Puy (decided herewith), 101 N. Y. Supp. 81.
